name: InboundOrderLineSchedule
description: Stores schedule-line level data within an inbound_order_line and is relevant only when schedules are used.

fields.name: connection_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the data source (i.e. connection). Auto populated by Galaxy.

fields.name: status
fields.description:
Status of line (e.g. submitted, confirmed)

'Reserved' values for [Galaxy] 2022: 
"Cancelled" (populated in SAP mapping; also used for deleted)
"Open" (not populated in SAP mapping)
"Closed" (not populated in SAP mapping)
"InTransit" (not populated in SAP mapping)
"Confirmed" (not populated in SAP mapping)
"": Null is also acceptable; 
Usage is determined by apps and customers
Customers can also populate their own values.

fields.name: goods_issue_date
fields.description: Date and time when material was available at origin to ship (typically for PO)

fields.name: material_availability_date
fields.description: Date and time when material is available at origin to ship

fields.name: ship_date
fields.description: Date and time when vendor would ship products for this order-line

fields.name: delivery_date
fields.description: Date and time when vendor would deliver products in this order-line to company location.

fields.name: quantity_submitted
fields.description: Quantity submitted to vendor (for POs), or quantity for transfer (for transfer orders)

fields.name: quantity_received
fields.description: Quantity received into inventory at destination

fields.name: db_creation_dttm
fields.description: Internal audit field - stores when the record was created

fields.name: db_updation_dttm
fields.description: Internal audit field - stores when the record was last updated

fields.name: sap_lips__vbeln
fields.description: Delivery Number. Predicate key for SAP mapping. Upsert key for VTTP

fields.name: sap_vttp__tknum
fields.description: Shipment Number. Predicate key for SAP mapping. Upsert key for VTTK
